abstract: The parties to the Google book settlement, which would legalize the creation of a vast library of digital books, told the judge that they would submit a revised settlement by Monday.
snippet: The parties to the Google book settlement, which would legalize the creation of a vast library of digital books, told the judge that they would submit a revised settlement by Monday.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge in Manhattan on Monday granted an extension until Friday for a revised settlement of Google’s effort to legalize its plan to create a vast library of digital books.

headline.main: Google and Authors Win Extension for Book Settlement
headline.print_headline: Google and Authors Win Extension for Book Settlement
